title: Dissecting the effect of long-term exposure to air pollution on risk of dementia in UK Biobank.
abstract: Mounting evidence links air pollution to dementia, the most prevalent cause of cognitive impairment in older people. Here we investigated individual and compound effects of particulate matters (PM
